name: Deep in the Caves (Prototype)
description: Welcome to Deep in the Caves an open world cave exploration game! Have fun looking around all the Randomly Generated World of Build your own cave base with your friends (Online has not been added to the Prototype!) Make shops or Gather Resources to keep the cave running... But Your not alone in the Caves Your going to have people that your going to have to clear, Also light is limited so collect the crystals or make a factory to produce them! (All the things mentioned may not come in the prototype) Please do not feel pressured to buy this game!😊
